item.description:
Hey All,

I wanted to tell you about a show that is coming up for a fellow Indie Rock Boston member. It is somewhat short notice, but if you want to see a good local band you should go to the Paradise Lounge this Friday at 8:00 PM.

The price is $10 at the door for the show but if you e-mail Aaron at rosenthalmusic@rcn.com and tell him your favorite current album he will knock off $4, making it only $6 for the three bands.

If you haven?t been to the Paradise Lounge it is one of the best smaller venues in Boston where there is seating and food available during the show. It is a great place to get a large plate of nachos and a cheap UFO.

Here is a brief description of the band:

This Blue Heaven appeared on the New England music scene in early 2007 with
a dynamic brand of indie pop/rock, making new fans and generating industry
buzz along the way. This Blue Heaven blends elements of jangle pop, folk,
and new wave to create a sound that blurs the distinction between
introspection and celebration. Music, blogs, and other TBH goodies can be
found online at www.myspace.com/thisblueheaven.

This Blue Heaven at The Paradise Lounge
Friday, Jan 18, 9pm
18+, $10
www.myspace.com/thisblueheaven

The Paradise Lounge
969 Commonwealth Avenue
Boston, Massachusetts 02215
item.why: Support a local Indie Rock Boston member, listen to some music and eat some good food
item.name: This Blue Heaven at the Paradise Lounge this Friday
